title: 17 "Curse of the Egyptian Pharaoh - Part IV"(Japanese:「薪能薫悲恋情」〜第一段〜) January 28, 2000(2000-01-28)
transformers_text: 17 Curse of the Egyptian Pharaoh Part IV Japanese January 28 2000 2000 01 28 Ka or uk o finds evidence that Is shiki has been living at Takahashi's house and then Sakon discovers that the telephone handsets in the museum had been tampered with Sakon tricks Is shiki into revealing that he knew about the telephone tampering discrediting his alibi and exposing him as the murderer It appears that Museum's director Yu uki Mari realized that the Egyptian knife that Is shiki purchased was a fake Is shiki then killed her to hide his grave professional mistake
tf_idf_text: curse egyptian pharaoh part japanese january find evidence shiki live takahashis house sakon discovers telephone handset museum tamper sakon trick shiki reveal know telephone tamper discredit alibi expose murderer appear museum director uki mari realize egyptian knife shiki purchase fake shiki kill hide grave professional mistake
